name: V-HouseholdChoreChart
0:
”Alexa, open household chore chart”
”Alexa, ask household chore chart to read my chore list”
”Alexa, ask household chore chart to log a chore”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: household chore chart
des: Use this skill to keep track of chores that are assigned to each member of your household. You can ask Alexa to read the list of chores that are assigned to you each day, and you can log your chores as you complete them. Alexa automatically keeps score so you can complete with family members to see who finishes their chores first. Or last! The chore tracker automatically resets on Sunday each week.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
